message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can always negotiate later.

Alice, your offer was a bit lopsided.  Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This accounts for the time value of money - my share decreases faster than yours with each round.
Okay, I understand your point about the time value of money. I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45, and hopefully we can finally settle this.
